properties.abstract: Campanitt (small clock towers) they are called by the inhabitants of Valle di Blenio, Pizzo Columbe (dove horn) in Leventina: the bizarre pinnacles made of blinding white rock. By the way: this is the ideal tour for mixed groups. Close to Piano Grande the group separates: the slow hikers continue their stroll, while the ambitious climbers hike across the mountain. At Lago dei Campanitt they meet again. The scenery: beautiful high plains, lush pastures, countless lakes. The rock: surprisingly stable. The ascent: surprisingly easy – for both groups.
properties.subtitle: Surprisingly stable, surprisingly easy
properties.title: Ascent on the south face, descent on the west face

sac_photos.title: On the descent on the west face you pass by a characteristic rock tower called «cane» (dog).
Campanitt (or Pizzo Columbe) from the south.
